attributes.action: Petition to stop limiting the amount of resits and scrapping January exams for A-Levels
attributes.additional_details: Petition to stop limiting the amount of resits to 1 and scrapping January exams (2013). This is to halt the policy that OFQUAL has introuduced (9/11/12) to ensure fairness in post-16 education and beyond

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of Ofqual
